entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
